channel.title: Something I Drew
channel.description:
Yes, I know it is based off of "Skunk Fu!"
Do I care on what you think of that? No, I do not.
Do I like drawing? Yes, even though this drawing is shitty, I find all forms of art that have time taken into them, are in fact beautiful.
Took me about 10 mins
Enjoy:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ymhbp1.gif[/img]

item.title: Something I Drew
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:7, topic:270642”]Wow, epic fail at trying to sound articulate.

I highly doubt this pick took you up to 30 mins. It looks like a doodle.[/quote]I do not want to sound articulate, I just wanted to get my point across. Oh, and that “30 minutes” thing was a type, it took 10.

Read full topic

item.title: Something I Drew
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:6, topic:270642”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=357150.msg2732470#msg2732470 date=1238822067]

I actually love life, so no thanks.

That’s unfortunate, we need another suicide, but this time a funny one because you are of no value to this community or the world at large.
[/quote]Why should it matter to me if I “matter” in this community? Why should I even care? I simply do not care on those simple things anymore, I respect your opinion on me and gladly deny it. If you wish to continue this argument, please do. I am greatly amused by your absurd behavior on such petty talk on me “killing myself”

Though it may be unfortunate to you and most likely many others that I will not be taking my own life today, I still have respect for you and most of the people whom despise me. Other than that, I wish you a good day.[/quote]

My complaint to Jagex

Using a thesaurus cannot polish a turd, in fact it makes it look even more absurd - like a turd in a fluffy pink dress dancing a waltz.

Read full topic

item.title: Something I Drew
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:5, topic:270642”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=357150.msg2732413#msg2732413 date=1238817143]
I actually love life, so no thanks.
[/quote]
That’s unfortunate, we need another suicide, but this time a funny one because you are of no value to this community or the world at large.[/quote]Why should it matter to me if I “matter” in this community? Why should I even care? I simply do not care on those simple things anymore, I respect your opinion on me and gladly deny it. If you wish to continue this argument, please do. I am greatly amused by your absurd behavior on such petty talk on me “killing myself”

Though it may be unfortunate to you and most likely many others that I will not be taking my own life today, I still have respect for you and most of the people whom despise me. Other than that, I wish you a good day.

Read full topic

item.title: Something I Drew
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:2, topic:270642”]Yiff in hell, furfag.[/quote]I am not a YIFF or a furfag. I know it sucks, but as I said in the stated above post, I don’t care. I drew it halfheartedly while working on something else.

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:3, topic:270642”]this fucking sucks.

go kill yourself[/quote]I actually love life, so no thanks.
